NSPrivacyAccessedAPITypes.NSPrivacyAccessedAPICategoryDiskSpace: TreeNotes uses disk space information to ensure there is sufficient storage available for saving your notes securely and efficiently, enhancing your note-taking experience.
NSPrivacyAccessedAPITypes.NSPrivacyAccessedAPICategoryFileTimestam: TreeNotes accesses file timestamp information to organize your notes chronologically, helping you easily find and manage your notes based on when they were created or last modified.
NSPrivacyAccessedAPITypes.NSPrivacyAccessedAPICategorySystemBootTi: TreeNotes references system boot time to provide reliable note-taking functionality, ensuring that notes are accurately timestamped, even across system restarts.
NSPrivacyAccessedAPITypes.NSPrivacyAccessedAPICategoryUserDefaults: TreeNotes uses UserDefaults to store your preferences and settings, including theme selection and default note organization options, to personalize your app experience.
